edu.kit.informatik.matchthree.framework.interfaces

Interface MoveFactory


  • public interface MoveFactory
    Creates moves with specific semantics.

    The different moves are explained in detail on the task sheet.

    Author:
    IPD Koziolek

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Move flipDown(Position position)
      Returns a move that flips the given position with the one below.
      Move flipRight(Position position)
      Returns a move that flips the given position with the one on its right.
      Move rotateColumnDown(int columnIndex)
      Returns a move that rotates the given column down.
      Move rotateRowRight(int rowIndex)
      Returns a move that rotates the given row right.
      Move rotateSquareClockwise(Position position)
      Returns a move that rotates a 2 by 2 square originating from the given position clockwise.

    • Method Detail

      • flipRight

        Move flipRight(Position position)
        Returns a move that flips the given position with the one on its right.

        The different moves are explained in detail on the task sheet.

        Parameters:
        position - the position to use as origin for this move
        Returns:
        a new flip right move

      • flipDown

        Move flipDown(Position position)
        Returns a move that flips the given position with the one below.

        The different moves are explained in detail on the task sheet.

        Parameters:
        position - the position to use as origin for this move
        Returns:
        a new flip down move

      • rotateSquareClockwise

        Move rotateSquareClockwise(Position position)
        Returns a move that rotates a 2 by 2 square originating from the given position clockwise.

        The different moves are explained in detail on the task sheet.

        Parameters:
        position - the position to use as origin for this move
        Returns:
        a new rotate square clockwise move

      • rotateColumnDown

        Move rotateColumnDown(int columnIndex)
        Returns a move that rotates the given column down.

        The different moves are explained in detail on the task sheet.

        Parameters:
        columnIndex - the column to rotate
        Returns:
        a new rotate column down move

      • rotateRowRight

        Move rotateRowRight(int rowIndex)
        Returns a move that rotates the given row right.

        The different moves are explained in detail on the task sheet.

        Parameters:
        rowIndex - the row to rotate
        Returns:
        a new rotate row right move
